skill.gokistats.protection.text: Take %f%% less damage from most enemy attacks.
skill.gokistats.tempering.text: Take %f%% less damage from fire and lava.
skill.gokistats.feather_fall.text: Take %1$f%% less damage from falling more than %2$f blocks;
skill.gokistats.swimming.disabled: I do nothing when Player API is loaded!
skill.gokistats.climbing.disabled: I do nothing when Player API is loaded!
skill.gokistats.pugilism.text: Deal %f%% more damage with your tree punchers.
skill.gokistats.bowmanship.text: Deal %f%% more damage with a bow.
skill.gokistats.reaper.text: %1$f%% chance to instantly kill enemies with less than %2$f health;
skill.gokistats.treasure_finder.text: Chance to find additional items when harvesting blocks.
skill.gokistats.treasure_finder.upgrade: Chance to find more rare additional items when harvesting blocks.
skill.gokistats.treasure_finder.disabled: Requires Additional Events to be installed
skill.gokistats.furnace_finesse.text: Smelt %1$f ticks faster %2$f%% of the time while using a furnace.
skill.gokistats.furnace_finesse.disabled: Disabled due to huge performance leak
skill.gokistats.stealth.text: Move %1$f%% faster and reap %2$f%%more often (%3$f%%) when sneaking.;
skill.gokistats.mining_magician.text: Chance to find additional materials when harvesting ores.
skill.gokistats.mining_magician.disabled: Requires Additional Events to be installed
skill.gokistats.roll.text: %f%% chance to avoid damage and counterattack enemy.
ui.hover: Click to upgrade, or Ctrl+Click to downgrade
